text: Wildcats is a 1986 American sports comedy movie directed by Michael Ritchie and starring Goldie Hawn, Wesley Snipes, Swoosie Kurtz, Robyn Lively, Jan Hooks, James Keach, Woody Harrelson, LL Cool J, Gloria Stuart, Niki Corri. It was distributed by Warner Bros.. ==Other websites== * * Category:1986 comedy movies Category:American sports comedy movies Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by Michael Ritchie Category:Movies about racism Category:Movies about race and ethnicity Category:Movies set in Chicago
title: Wildcats (movie)
